data.text: @Steph22881746 Steph, in this case they are the ones the can help you open the PIR.
@KrishaKinn Hola Krisha. For now, there is no news. Additionally, in case of presenting any update, they will be notified by SMS/email. We are sorry for the inconvenience with your luggage. Regards

@alvarohmaliaga Hola, Alvaro. por favor envíanos un MD con la siguiente información: Nombre completo, código de reserva, número de billete y correo electrónico. Estaremos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.

@KrishaKinn HEllo. We are very sorry for the inconvenience that may have arisen. Through the DM you sent us, we have indicated how to check the status of the shipment. We appreciate your patience. Kind regards.
@WTXJET Hola, sorry for the delay. We've just replied your DM. Please check. Best regards

@DanielRey93 HEllo, Daniel. We are very sorry that you have that impression. We understand that you have not yet received the answer to your last complaint. We hope that the area in charge has news as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards.
@ehealey1 We're terribly sorry, Elaine. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@ehealey1 Hola Elaine, sorry to read this. In case you don't receive the bag after landing in your final destination, please open a PIR (property irregularity report) with airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary. We remain at your disposal

@leah_andlit Hola Leah, according to the information on the tracing website, the delivery process was initiated yesterday. The courier might take up to 48h (sometimes a little longer) to make the delivery, depending on how many bags they have to deliver. We appreciate your patience
@abiliagroup Thanks. We'll contact the IBPlus Center and get back to you via DM as soon as we have an answer. Best regards
@abiliagroup We've sent you a new DM. Please check and provide the required info, so we can contact the IBPlus Center.
@abiliagroup You're welcome :)
@abiliagroup Sorry for the delay, we've just replied your DMs. Best regards
@SeanR1974 You're welcome, Sean. We remain at your disposal
@MoPkoB4E Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your claim reference number, full name and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@Steph22881746 Sorry to read this, Stephanie. Since the PIR wasn't opened at the airport, the only way to open it is by calling our baggage center by phone. Here you find the numbers listed by country https://t.co/xXBAaaJGze
@TheMurphstar to claim reimbursement once the bag has been delivered or after 7 days of searches. Kind regards

@TheMurphstar The bag is only considered lost after 21 days of searches, when you'll be able to claim compensation based on its content. By now, please keeo the invoices related to the first necessity expenses (toiletries, clothes...) for being without luggage, as you'll need them /1
@TheMurphstar Sorry, Matthew. Unfortunately, we're not able to precise when the bag will be located. We kindly ask you to please wait for an update via SMS or email. Best regards

@TheMurphstar Hola Matthew, unfortunately, the bag still hasn't been located. Please use the tracing website to follow up the searches and the delivery process https://t.co/P60eOiMvWp . Once it has been located, you'll receive a SMS or email. Kind regards
@kabu_swe Hola William, we are sorry for the inconvenience, we have replied your DM with all details. Regards
@tjeninho Hola Tom, thank you for contactin gus, we have replied your DM. Regards
@mikaellasassen Hola, sentimos la demora, revisamos tu DM. Saludos
@SarahMetClimate Hola Sarah, sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, this type of claim must be submitted within 7 days after the bag has been received. Kind regards
@SeanR1974 please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, current location and phone number with international prefix https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@SeanR1974 Hola Sean, sorry to read this. Since the air traffic controllers strike in France is beyond our control, we're not able to cover the hotel expenses in case your flight is affected. If you need further assistance, /1

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Gaming Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to offline and online games such as gaming consoles, tabletop games, video game publishers

data.text: @emma_ronson Hola Emma, thank you for the information, we have replied your DM. Regards

@emma_ronson Hola Ando, we are sorry to read this, if the PIR was opened through Iberia, please share us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name, if the PIR was opened through other airline, please contact them directly to verify the options. Regards
@kabu_swe Hola William, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM with all deliver details, we really appreciate your patience. Kind regards

@kabu_swe Hola William, we are sorry that we cannot provide you with additional information at the moment, we can only suggest you contact our luggage companions by calling the corresponding number: https://t.co/ci7QjJOTT1 We remain attentive to any news by this means, regards.

@alvarohmaliaga Hola Álvaro, anteriormente te hemos solicitado datos para poder consultar esta información. De esta forma deberiamos poder saber como asistirte, quedamos atentos por MD. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@audreyshoe1 Hola Audrey, could you send us an MD with the file number associated with the claim to review? We are waiting for the information. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@jtcamp49er Hola Jack, how can we help you? Let us know the details of the incident by DM to review and help you from this department. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@3vil_3mpire Hola, we do not know the details of your case. To review please send us a DM with all the information. From this department we remain at your disposal. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@josh_bacchus Hola Josh, we would like to have more information about your case. Could you send us a direct message with all the information to review and help you from this department? We await the information. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@AdrianaRuizMad1 We have answered to your message in spanish, Adriana. Regards
@stacey_coster Hola Stacey, thank you for contacting us. In order to review please send us a DM with your reservation code and full name. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@aneelaaaaa_22 Aneela, we have responded to your direct messages. Let us know by DM in case of any doubt. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@kabu_swe Unfortunately, it's not possible to contact the handling agents directly. Our baggage center sent them a message and we need to wait for the update. Sorry
@benlarrive Hola Benjamin, please check our new DM. The payment has been processed and we'll ask the claims department to re-send the email
@TheMurphstar Hola Matthew, the bag is only considered lost after 21 days of searches, when you'll be able to claim compensation based on its content. We appreciate your patience
@AnthonyYey_ Hola Anthony. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@matteo_tisato Hola Matteo, due to technical reasons, the flight had to get back to its parking slot. Sorry for the inconvenience. Kind regards
@borgmintonZase Ok :)
@cmalatt Hola, sorry to read this. Please ask Mr. Sang to contact us directly, as we can only share information with the passenger who opened the PIR at the airport. Best regards
@borgmintonZase Hola, sorry to read this. Could you send us a DM with the booking code and email address related to the voucher? https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@dawn_skelton63 Hola Dawn, sorry for the inconvenience. We've replied your DM. Best regards

@kabu_swe We're saying that our colleagues asked the agents at Madrid to send the bag to your home country. You'll receive a SMS or email as soon as the agents on your home country confirm the bag's arrival. Best regards
@TheMurphstar Hola. As soon as the baggage center has any update about the bag's location and its delivery, you'll be contacted directly via SMS or email. Sorry for the delay

@kabu_swe Our colleagues asked the agents at the airport to send the bag to the permanent address, but they still haven't received a confirmation of the bag's arrival. You'll only receive the update once they have such information and the delivery process has been initiated.

@kabu_swe Sorry for the inconvenience, William. There's no need to go to Madrid to collect the bag, because we already asked the relevant department to send it to your permanent address. We kindly ask you to please wait for an update via SMS or email about the delivery process . Regards
@beasleygreen Sorry for the inconvenience, Beasley. In order to assist you, please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR (property irregularity report) reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@aneelaaaaa_22 Hola Aneela, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@abiliagroup Hola, could you give us the details by DM? Thank you.
@Ashyazahid Hola, please send us the details by DM, we will gladly help. Regards.
@BethPollington Hola Beth, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number, full name and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@RepkoKarina Hola Karina, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DM. We'll contact the claims department and ask them to move on with your case. Kind regards
@LoriniKako Hola Kako, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

urls.title: Benefits for oneworld travellers - Iberia
urls.description: See the benefits you can enjoy with oneworld because you are an Iberia Plus member. Your card level is recognised by all affiliated airlines

data.text: @WaldoPierreHere Hola Waldo, you have to link your booking with your frequent flyer number, also you can check all the benefits at: https://t.co/XtW87l4BYl. Regards.

@emhgau If you need to change your booking, you can do so free of charge in the seven days following the departure of your flight, either through our Booking Centre or your travel agency. Does she needs special assistance? Let us know the details by DM. Regards.

@emhgau Hola Em, There are no restrictions on travelling with that, but for flights lasting more than 2 hours it must have been fitted at least 48 hours ago or it must be split lengthwise. You don't need clearance from our Medical Service, but she can bring her prescription. 1/2

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @TheMurphstar Unfortunately we still waiting for some news, we will contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@EPughAK Hola Emma, our apologies, we will check this internally with our team and contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@LilSkunk20 Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@mrl8668 Hola, is possible that you have to check in the luggage again, but we can´t tell you this for sure until we check the booking code. You can send us a DM with the information. Regards.
@nikiwantsfood Hola Niki, could you send us the flight number or your booking code by DM to check? Thank you https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Qwerty84905103 Hola Qwerty, please send us the details of this case by DM, we will check this gladly. Regards.
@mendac20 Thank you María, we recommend to erase the personal information from this public message. We will check this matter.
@SerenaJadeC Hola Serena, we remain at your disposal. Regards.
@mendac20 Hola María, Could you send us the information of your flight please? Thank you.
@Paolo14420513 Hola Paolo, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@Ashleelovesall Ashlee, please send us a DM with all details, you can do it through this link: https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@jelanify Hola Jelani, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@cheyset Hola Sharon, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number, registered email more details about the voucher expiration in order to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Ashleelovesall Hola Ashlee. We're sorry to read this. If there's anything we may help you with from here, we remain at your disposal. Regards
@mrl8668 Hola. Could you please indicate us if all your flights belong to the same booking and has it been purchased through our company? Please let us know.
@TheMurphstar Once the department in charge has any updates, they'll notify you directly, Matthew. We appreciate your patience. Regards

@dmcintyrepga Hola David. If it's a connecting flight and it belongs to a sole booking, you wouldn't have any inconvenience. If you have multiple bookings, then it would be necessary to take the luggage and check it again. Regards

@SerenaJadeC Hola Serena. We have requested details about your case via direct messages but we have not received them yet. We remain at your disposal once you may provide us with this information. Regards

@kevkader que te dirige al formulario de reclamaciones para que incluyas tu información, junto tu PIR para solicitar la compensación por gastos de necesidad. Reiteramos mencionar que, sugerimos guardar los recibos o facturas de las compras que realices de primera necesidad. Un saludo.

@kevkader Hola Kevin. Como te indicamos anteriormente, dado que nuestros compañeros se encuentran trabajando en la localización de tu equipaje, no podríamos acelerar el proceso desde este canal. Así mismo, te indicamos que para poder proceder, por favor hazlo a través del enlace /1
@z_skajsbba Hola, in previous messages we have requested additional information, we are waiting by that means. Regards
@PaulGra00860842 Hola Paul, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Alex_stead1 Hola Alex, sorry for the delay. We've just replied your DMs

@DamienS66415881 Hola Damien, sorry for the inconvenience. Did you open the PIR at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with your PIR number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@kabu_swe Hola William, we replied to your DM. Kind regards.
@TheMurphstar Hola, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DM. Best regards

@wishfuleventer Our form accepts all types of tickets, including the ones issued by BA. If an error pops up, you just need to keep clicking on ''continue''. In case you aren't sure that the flight was operated by us or by BA, please tell us the flight number
@dawn_skelton63 Hola Dawn, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @wishfuleventer Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. If the flight was operated by us, you can use the following form https://t.co/qlaQPQyv0e
@vero_kiejnich Hola Vero, Could you send us the details of the flight and your booking code by DM? Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@alittleglimmer Hola,  Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you.

@dmcintyrepga Hola, the authorities in the country or territory you’re traveling to are responsible for setting and enforcing the rules for entry. If you are unclear about any aspect of the entry requirements, or you need further reassurance, you will need to contact them directly. Regards.
@beasleygreen Sorry for the inconvenience, Beasley. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@crisperan Hola Cristobal, hemos pedido detalles por DM para poder entender tu consulta. Saludos
@b2gTravel Hola, how we can help you?

@RM_LewisAu Hola, we apologize for the situation, we will check this regarding to improve. We recommend you to erase your number from the pubic post, and please send us your information by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@RM_LewisAu Hola, could you send us the details about what happened and your frequent flyer information to check the situation please? Thank you.
@DaniMurillo23 Hola Danny, en principio te sugerimos revisar esos detalles del periodo y cantidad de dosis directamente con la embajada y autoridades sanitarias del país, saludos cordiales

@hollymsinatra Hola, te sugerimos guardar las facturas de los gastos que requieras hacer, lamentamos tu equipaje este demorado, ten por seguro que el área a cargo esta trabajando en una pronta solución, ¿nos das más información en un md?. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
